description: The use of cash varies a lot from one village to another and if we look at the graph below we can see that it is in the villages where the people received the biggest amount that the cash was mainly used for Qhat.
title: Main use of cash per village

description: The total cash received varies a lot from one village to another
title: Distribution of total cash received from CFW per village

description: The level of investment is also quite different from one village to another and it seems to be correlated to the amount of cash received from CFW.
title: Distribution of level of annual investment for livelihood per village

description: People having plans for leaving are mainly from Eden and Sanaa Governorate
legendtitle: Are you planning to leave the country?
title: Plans for leaving per village

description: We only see contribution of women in the income of the household in certain villages.
ytitle:
Percentage of women among adults
contributing to income generation
title: Distribution of percentage of women among adults contributing to income generation per village

description: The duration of the effect of cashs has nothing to do with the amount received, as we could see it in the machine learning results.
ytitle:
How long were the effects of the cash
you received ? (months)
title: Distribution of duration of CFW effect per village

description: As we saw in the Machine learning results,  where women are involved in the decisions of the household and/or contributing to the income of the household,  the effects of the project seem to be longer.
ytitle:
Part of women in the decisions on
how CFW cash is used in the household
title: Distribution of part of women in the decisions on how CFW cash is used in the household per village

description: Sensitization seems to have not been as efficient in each locations.
legendtitle: Do you know why you were selected for this project ?
title: Do people know why they were selected ? (Per village)

description: Particularly in Sanea’ alqadimuh the level of effort required seem to have been too much.
legendtitle: Is there reasonable level of effort?
title: Was the level of effort reasonnable ? (Per village)

description: In the same villages where the level of effort was sometimes considered not to be reasonnable are people also considering that the salary was not correct
legendtitle: Do you think your daily salary was correct?
title: Was the daily salary correct ? (Per village)

description: Here again we can see that there is no corelation between the amount received and the duration of the cash received.
ytitle:
How long the cash from the
CFW project received lasted? (months)
title: Distribution of how long the cash received lasted per village

description: The longer the project lasted the more likely we can see increase in some expenses (meat, milk, clothes, health….)
ytitle:
How long the cash by the
CFW project received lasted? (months)
title: Distribution of the duration of the cash received per expenditures which could increase thanks to the cash received.

description: The more the decision is shared among all adults member of the household the longer the cash effects lasted
ytitle: Number of months the effect of the project lasted
title: Distribution of months the effect of the project lasted per number of adults contributing to the decisions on how the cash is used

description: When women participate in CFW activities, the main use of cash is more likely to be related to investment related expenses like school, health and clothes
ytitle:
Percentage of women among adults
participating in CFW activities
title: Distribution of percentages of women among the adults participating in the CFW activities per main usage of cash received

description: The more the people are educated the more likely women are involved in the decisions of the household.
ytitle:
Part of women in the decisions on
how CFW cash is used in the household
title: Distribution of part of women in the decisions on how CFW cash is used in the household per mean education of adults in the family
